lead_paragraph: A young man searches for the "master" to help him reach the final level of martial arts mastery known as "the glow." Along the way he must fight an evil martial arts expert and rescue a beautiful singer from an obsessed music promoter.
snippet: A young man searches for the "master" to help him reach the final level of martial arts mastery known as "the glow." Along the way he must fight an evil martial arts expert and rescue a beautiful singer from an obsessed music promoter.
